column2: Goblins taming and riding a squig enables them to move at the much faster speed of a squig and even somewhat improves the battle prowess of the squig.
Goblins who have proven to be useful have a certain level of protection provided by the leaders of the horde. That does not protect them from said leaders though.
Manipulating Trolls is a key skill for a member of the Carrion Tribe to rise the ranks and to survive. In most cases this is very easy to do, hunger is an ever useful motivator for trolls.
A leader of his tribe. A poor one at that, but still pushes the Carrion Tribe to greater performance in battle than none leader at all.
Take them arrows, boyz. We'z gonna need them later.
